regen.absent_element: specify conditions under which parameters such as deadline and cost can be changed
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall allow changes to deadline and cost parameters only if the job has not started execution and the user has administrative privileges.

label: If the user wishes to specify a different output directory or a delayed deadline, the scheduler shall modify the job parameters.
absence: situation of the user wishes to specify job parameters
